search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ConvertCalculator (convertcalculator.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for ConvertCalculator is: [https://www.convertcalculator.com/pricing/](https://www.convertcalculator.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Pricing

Plans & pricing\_

Plans for today, and the future of your company
===============================================

Build it yourself in hours instead of weeks, for a cost that is less per month than what a developer typically charges per hour.

Starter\_

Free
----

Access Platinum features like these and more on the Free plan until you reach 100 visits per month.

[Start for free](https://www.convertcalculator.com/app/sign-up/)

No credit card required

Cancel anytime

#### Form elements

All the form elements you need to translate your business logic into a form.

#### Charts and graphs

Engage users visually with sophisticated charts and graphs.

#### Date and time fields

Automate your booking, ordering, delivery systems, and more.

#### Table for datasets

Organize datasets and make creating complex calculators much easier.

#### Capture payments

Set up a store and your items sell directly from your website.

#### Multi-page forms

Create multi-step forms that bring in 2× more leads — without code.

#### Show / hide logic

Forms adapt based on user responses, creating a personalized experience.

#### Calculations and formulas

Make your apps smart with the functions you know from Excel.

#### File uploads

Accept files simply and securely without clogging up your inbox.

Ready to upgrade?\_

Plans that scale as you do
--------------------------

Upgrade to a paid plan to process more visits & submissions, remove Convert\_ branding, and unlock more features.

**Pay annually**, get two months for free

#### Hobby\_

---

/ mo

Perfect for pricing, savings, and Return-on-Investment calculators.

[Start for free](https://www.convertcalculator.com/app/sign-up/)

##### Additional service

![Image 3](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pF2AxlVmy5F51GOyLstAXdyyzM.svg)

Concierge Service\_

$250
----

Starter price

We can build your interactive content for you, help you integrate it on your website, and will ensure it looks great and on-brand. Afterwards, you can always pick up the work and make changes yourself.

[Explore our service](https://www.convertcalculator.com/services/concierge-service/)

![Image 4: Convert_ Concierge service](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NRPAH7w7F9hMApEkRzcLr3BmP88.png?scale-down-to=1024)

FAQ\_

FAQ: Everything you need to know before upgrading your plan
-----------------------------------------------------------

Visit our docs if you want to learn more, or reach out to our support team. We’re very responsive.

[Visit our docs](https://www.convertcalculator.com/help/)

### What skills do I need to get started?

 

None! We made a really powerful and simple to use editor to create your calculator. If you are trying to do complex calculations, experience with Excel could be useful. Otherwise our team is happy to help!

### How long will it take me to get a calculator up and running?

 

It really depends on what kind of calculator you are building. Simple calculators can be up and running in 30 minutes. For more complex calculators it can take a couple of hours.

### Do you have a free trial?

 

Yes! You can use ConvertCalculator without limits for the first month. After that, you can keep using it for free, but your calculators get disabled when you pass 100 monthly visits.

### I'm on the Free plan, but my live calculators are disabled. Why?

 

Our free plan is designed for companies with low website traffic. Users can stay on the free plan until they reach 100 visits per month. Once this limit is exceeded, your account will no longer be eligible for the free plan and your live calculators will be disabled. If you wish to reactivate your live calculators, you will need to subscribe to one of our paid plans.

### How is usage calculated?

 

We calculate usage by looking at visits. Every time a calculator is loaded onto a page, we count it as a visit.

### What happens when I'm over my limit?

 

We disable your calculators 2 days after you passed your monthly visit limit. Don't worry, we notify you when your usage is at 80% and 100%, so you have plenty of time to upgrade.

### Am I tied to a contract?

 

There are absolutely no contracts with ConvertCalculator. You can cancel or pause you account at any time.

### What's included in support?

 

We help you by answering all your questions and giving you instructions when you need them. We will especially help you with the setup of your equations and formulas; we know that this is the hardest part of the product!

![Image 5](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pL8ORfwjRopqtSJbpwSJkVJTzU.jpg)
